page.title: 10SHOPS
page.content: The only food{supermarket}was opened in October 1982 by a family which came to the area, built a small private housing estate and then fronted it with a shop. It is used by about 175 people weekly. The shop keeper has doubts if she would establish a shop elsewhere as this one has to be subsidized by herself. Those who do not use it go to Hay, Brecon, Builth or to Hereford. Price is the deciding factor. Most women have large deep freezers and buy in bulk also there are travelling shops for groceries, clothes and household goods as well as the daily milkman. The{post office}is used by about 20 people each week. Its greatest problem is that not all use it. The{building society}office housed in the shops is well used. It encounters few problems. The main investors are children!
